protocol.name: P-GSE29941-2
protocol.text: Hypoxia treatment commenced at the end of the 16 h light cycle under 6.5 µmol s–1 m–2 light, in open or sealed chambers. For hypoxia, 99.995% argon gas was bubbled through water and into the chamber for 2 h. Control plants were exposed to the same light and temperature conditions but maintained in air. Whole seedlings were frozen under liquid nitrogen within 3 min of release from treatment and stored at -80 oC until use.

protocol.name: P-GSE29941-3
text: Seeds used for this analysis  were after-ripened seeds obtained from plants grown at the same time within the same tray within the same controlled environment chambers to minimize differences in pre-harvest history. For pre-germinated seeds samples, seeds were surface sterilized for 5 min in 5% (v/v) bleach and then washed twice in distilled water. The seeds were then plated on square plates containing 0.5×Murashige and Skoog (MS, Sigma-Aldrich) salt mixture in 1% (w/v) bacto-agar and stratified at 4˚C for 48 h. Plates were incubated vertically at 22°C in 150 μmol m−2 s−1 constant light for 24 h and then whole seeds were sampled for total RNA extraction. For hypoxia-treated seedling samples, seeds were surface sterilized with 95 % (v/v) ethanol for 5 min, followed by 10 min submergence in bleach solution (20 % (v/v) bleach and 0.1 % (v/v) Tween-20), and finally rinsed three times with sterile water. Seeds were stored at 4°C for 3 days, and then plated on solid MS plates (0.43 % (w/v) Murashigi Skoog (MS) salts (Sigma, St. Louis, MO), 0.4 % (w/v) phytage, pH 5.75l (Sigma), 1 % (w/v) sucrose, pH 5.7), and placed at a vertical orientation in a growth chamber (Percival Scientific, Inc.,
model CU36L5C8) under long day conditions (16 h light at ~80 µmol photons m-2 s-1/ 8 h darkness) at 23 °C for 7 days.

protocol.name: P-GSE29941-4
protocol.text: Total RNA was extracted by using QIAGEN RNeasy Plant Mini kit according to the manufacture's protocol. RNase-Free DNase treatment was conducted during the column purification process.

protocol.name: P-GSE29941-5
protocol.text: Biotin-labelled cRNA was synthesized from 500 ng total RNA with the Affymetrix 3’ IVT Express Labelling kit (Santa Clara, CA).

protocol.name: P-GSE29941-6
protocol.text: Hybridization of 12 μg of biotin-labelled cRNA to each Arabidopsis ATH1 Genome Array (GeneChip System®, Affymetrix) chips were performed at 45 °C for 16 h, in the Affymetrix GeneChip Workstation (hybridization oven 640, Fluidics Station 450), using 10 µg of Biotin-labeled aRNA, according to the manufacturer's protocol.

protocol.name: P-GSE29941-7
protocol.text: GeneChips were scanned using the Affymetrix GeneChip Scanner 3000 7G .

protocol.name: P-GSE29941-8
text: CEL files from the Affymetrix Chips were processed by use of the R program (

). The Robust Multi-chip Average (RMA) normalization was performed using the default settings of the corresponding R function. Present, Marginal or Absent (P/M/A) calls were computed with the affy package.
